data.title: The Best Texas Country Songs - Playlist
data.meta_description: A playlist of 100 country songs about the "Lone Star State" of Texas, USA from Holler.
data.text:
Playlist

The Best Texas Country Songs

From Alabama to Waylon, George to Tanya. Flying the Lone Star flag for Texas, with songs from Little Texas, Glen Campbell, Marty Robbins, Gene Autry and so many more.

From Alabama to Waylon, George to Tanya. Flying the Lone Star flag for Texas, with songs from Little Texas, Glen Campbell, Marty Robbins, Gene Autry and so many more.

Link copied

Spotify

YouTube Music

Ah, Texas. Famous for its BBQs and live music, searingly hot temperatures and football.

It's so loved, most country stars you can think of have written a song in tribute to or in longing to return to the Lone Star State.

From Alabama to Willie Nelson, Tanya Tucker to George Strait, this is the ultimate playlist dedicated to the best country songs about Texas.

Whether you're in San Antonio or Houston, Austin or Dallas, there's going to be a lone star song here for you.

See the full tracklist for Holler's Best Country Songs About Texas Playlist below:
